id_sector.description: Identifier used for ATC, if it differs from flight identifier

ref_epoch.description: The tail number or registration of the aircraft, if known and it differs from the ident

proj_exit_epoch.description: FAA or ICAO aircraft type code

proj_exit_lat_deg.description: ICAO airport code, waypoint, or latitude/longitude pair

proj_exit_lon_deg.description: ICAO airport code, waypoint, or latitude/longitude pair. May be missing if not known

proj_exit_alt_ft.description: Single letter code for current flight status, can be S Scheduled, F Filed, A Active, Z Completed, or X Cancelled

any_pcd.description: The scheduled out (gate departure) time (POSIX epoch format)

is_nct.description: The scheduled in (gate arrival) time (POSIX epoch format)
